quote_last:
,” he announced.
“Never!” ejaculated Crosthwaite incredulously. “Surely I haven’t——”
“Yes, you have,” interrupted Devereux with a laugh. “Seven and three-quarter hours of solid sleep! Sorry I disturbed you.”
title: The Fight for Constantinople
author: Percy F. Westerman

quote_first:
“It’s just a plain every-day fog,” he said. “But it’s certainly a wonder. What time is it? Who’s got a watch?”
“
quote_last: ,” replied Evan. “I’ll have to hurry or I won’t get down in time for football practice.”
title: Kingsford, Quarter
author: Ralph Henry Barbour
